description: I've had trouble finding software to run my sonos speakers through Ubuntu, but this software works great. It allowed me to group and ungroup the speakers easily. I have the older version of the speakers so I was worried about functionality. Thanks!
I've got 6 Sonos speakers in different configurations. Works perfectly!
Most likely over a longer use it will perform better than the original crappy stuff from SONOS.^^
summary: Great App, download, install and go with out any problems!

description:
I have been using Noson for a couple of years, and while it worked well, the UI was just a bit funky. This app I have only used it for 6 minutes and I already like the UI's functionality and look/feel. Keep up the good work developers. Audible service for some reason is not playing any titles I select hopefully this can be remedied.
Cheers!
Looking forward to Apple Music and other streaming services.
summary: Surprised to find an unofficial app, which works really well

description: Perhaps because it is a containerized "snap", this app crashes when you clcik select local library and can't see anything local. This is the problem with a lot of apps on snap.
summary: Does not detect local files / folders

description: Having said it is great on Ubuntu, it is a bit hit and miss on Raspbian.
Worked straight away.

Installed on Ubuntu Studio 20.04. Loaded right up, immediatly found my system and recognized my library no problem. 

I'm very pleased!
summary: Does exactly what it is supposed to do

description: Thank you for this great application- Installed, found all my speakers and playlists and just works- Great!
summary: Worked with all my Sonos Speakern

description: As soon as I launched the app it found my speaker and worked straight away.
If you have a Sonos system, this is a great app for control from Linux. Links to services, has control on all speaker devices and getting active development. Works well from a touch screen too.

Installs easily from the Ubuntu Software store. Able to detect my music in sub-folders once I showed it where the main music folder was. Detects my Sonos system and plays on it. I can't figure out how to add a music source other than my local files.

Donwloaded, installed, it found my SONOS system (about 2020 vintage) and we are set. 
Having it on a larger screen with a mouse makes navigating my library MUCH easier. 
UI is still taking me some time. Couldn't figure out how to add stuff to the Queue (its the little arrow to the right, but why not make that a button? its the single most frequent thing you are going to "do" 
Also looking forwad to maybe being able to creat playlists easily. It is fiddly on a touch screen
Many thanks to the maker!
Thank you work with pair of Sonos 1
läuft nicht ....

Layout sieht gut aus, die Sonos werden sofort gefunden. Leider sind die conetextmenü's leer und die Titel in der Libary werden nicht automatisch gefunden. 
OS: tuxedo 20.04
summary: startet & verbindet unter 20.04. Allerdings leere Menü's

description: Klasse, danke fürs entwickeln!

Habe ein großes und sehr komplexes Sonos System Version 2 (mit vielen verschiedenen Speakern, One, Arc Sub, Ikea usw) hab die software unter Ubuntu 22.10 installert, es wird sofort alles erkannt und funktioniert, was will man mehr. Besten Dank an den Entwickler :-)
No funciona con las actualizaciones de Sonos 08.2020
summary: No funciona con las actualizaciones de Sonos 08.2020

summary: Funciona perfectamente con una pareja de Sonos Roam
